DataElement.preferredDefinition: The variable used to indicate that data are not available by having the site recording a sponsor-defined value (e.g., Not Collected/Not Evaluated/Not Assessed/Not Available/Not Answered)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if the substance use data was not collected.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUSTAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM-based dataset, the SDTMIG variable SUSTAT is populated by mapping the value of the CDASH variable SUCSTAT "NOT COLLECTED" to "NOT DONE".

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A check box used to indicate that data collection was "Not Collected" .
